popover.primary: A mastery path focused on longer-duration battles
A mastery path focused on dealing quick exhaustive blows
A mastery path focused on area of effect offensive abilities

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: All your Exhaustive Blows have a 50% chance to restore 225 hit points.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds.  If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chop Til You Drop
data.description: Get Stuck In's cooldown timer is lowered by 10 seconds.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Dat Tickles!
data.description: Absorbs 3600 damage for up to 20 seconds.

data.name: Don't Bother Me None
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Don't Hate Da Choppa
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.

data.name: Don't Wanna Live Foreva
data.description: Increases your Strength and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.

data.name: Drop Da Basha
data.note: Requires Target to have Parried or Blocked
data.description: Your attacks become more precise, your target's chance to block or parry is reduced by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Easy Killin'
data.description: Reduces the Action Point costs by 5 points in Furious state and 10 points in Berserk state.

data.name: Finish 'Em Faster
data.description: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Blows are reduced by 25%.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Choppa
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 82 damage.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Git Stuck In
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Auto attack speed is increased by 35% for 20 seconds for all groupmates within 100 feet.

data.name: I'm Da Biggest!
data.description: Increases your Wounds by 160.

data.name: I'm Still Here
data.description: Increases the duration of Come An' Git It and Try An' Hurt Me by 5 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Outta My Face!
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds.  During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 253 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.description: Any roots or snares are removed, as all attempts to impede your movement are futile. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Stab You Gooder
data.description: All of your critical hits will deal 25% more bonus critical damage.

data.name: Supa Chop
data.description: Deals 1800 damage and reduces Action Point costs by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Tantrum
data.description: For the next 30 seconds you deal an additional 300 damage, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.

data.name: Was Dat Yer Finger?
data.description: When you do critical damage, reduces your target's Weapon Skill by 120 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Wot Rules?
data.description: Exhaustive Blows will no longer remove your Rage.

data.name: Keep On Choppin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You chop deeply into your enemy, dealing 253 damage. Your love of battle fills you with energy, restoring 100 Action Points.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Yer Gettin' Soft
data.description: When your attacks get defended, increases your chance to critically hit with Path of Da' Savage abilities by 100% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Can't Stop Da Chop
data.description: You chop at your enemy, dealing 206 damage and reducing the value of incoming heals on them by 50% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Red goes faster!
data.description: While Berserk, all cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Furious Choppin'
data.description: A merciless strike of attacks that repeatedly hits your target for up to 5 seconds, dealing up to 269 damage. You will be healed for all damage this ability deals.

data.name: We'z Fightin' Betta
data.description: Your rage inspires all around, causing groupmates' attacks to deal an additional 300 damage for 10 seconds while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Long Lasta
data.description: Any time your Exhaustive Blow gets defended, for the next 6 seconds all attacks will cost 0 action points.

data.name: Bleed Em Out
data.description: Your target suffers 750 damage over the next 10 seconds. The damage will start low, and increase as the effect continues.

data.name: Pent Up Rage
data.description: Every 4 seconds, you will gain one stack of an effect which reduces the Rage cost of your Exhaustive Blows by 25%. This effect stacks up to 3 times, and using an Exhaustive Blow will consume one stack.

data.name: Tired Already?
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You chop your target in a vital organ, dealing 216 damage. For the next 10 seconds, any abilities that they use will take an additional 5 seconds to cooldown.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Strong Finish
data.description: Increases the chance to critically hit with Path of Da' Big Hitta abilities by 15%, but if you are dual wielding, decreases your ability to defend critical hits by 10%.

data.name: No More Helpin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
A brutal attack which deals 441 damage to the target. For the next 10 seconds, any healing abilities that they use will be 50% as effective.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Yer Goin Down!
data.description: You chop all enemies within 30 feet for 1200 damage and all heals are reduced by 50% for 10 seconds. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.name: Longer and Stronger
data.description: While you are Furious, you regain 150 health every 4 seconds. While you are Berserk, you regain 262 health every 4 seconds.

data.name: Wot's Da Rush?
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Dual Wield
data.description:
You lash out at all enemies within 30 feet, inflicting 178 damage. All of the victims will also become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% to 40% for up to 9 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Extra Choppin'
data.description: Lotsa Choppin' will affect 24 targets within 30 feet and reduces the base damage by 20%.

data.name: Chop Fasta!
data.description: Group members within 100 feet are inspired by the way you shrug off the blows, for the next 20 seconds any ability used by your groupmates will cool down 5 seconds faster.

data.name: Keep It Comin'
data.description: When you die, you have a 25% chance of resurrecting at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within 40 feet and dealing 375 damage.

data.name: Git To Da Choppa
data.description: You charge and frantically lash out at everything nearby for up to 6 seconds, dealing 187 damage every 2 seconds to all enemies within 40 feet. Each time you deal damage, you'll randomly pull one of the victims in towards you. Your speed is increased by 20% for as long as this ability is active.

data.name: Stomp Da Yard
data.description: You stomp the ground, knocking down targets within 30 feet for 3 seconds and dealing 1800 damage. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.name: Reckless Blow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
A wild swing which Deals 291 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Don't Go Nowhere
data.description: A maiming attack which deals 178 damage to the target and snares them, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Throat Slasha
data.description: You slash at your opponent's throat, immediately inflicting 173 damage. The wound continues to bleed for 180 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Bring Da Pain!
data.description: Each time that you attack an enemy within the next 10 seconds, Any group member within 100 feet will have their Weapon Skill increased by 40, but your Initiative will also be reduced by 40 for the next 10 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to three times.

data.name: Try An' Hurt Me
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
An exhaustive blow that deals 178 damage and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by 100% for 10 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Go For Da Soft Spot
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal 291 damage to your enemy.

data.name: Weaklin' Killa
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing 403 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Hurtin' Time
data.description: While this ability is active, your will deal an additional 150 damage whenever you strike a target with a melee attack, but you will also suffer 75 damage each time this effect occurs.

data.name: Sit Down!
data.description: Deals 216 damage and knocks down the target for 3 seconds. The attack is undefendable.

data.name: Slasha
data.description: A furious slash that deals 253 damage and reduces your target's Toughness by 40 for 9 seconds. This effect is stackable up to three times.

data.name: Lotsa Choppin
data.description: You wildly swing at enemies in front of you within 25 feet, dealing anywhere from 113 damage to 173 damage. May only hit up to three targets.

data.name: Wild Choppin'
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You strike enemies within 30 feet, dealing anywhere from 141 damage to 291 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Come and Git It!
data.description: Increases your Toughness by 40 for each enemy within 30 feet, up to a maximum of 9 enemies, for 10 seconds.

data.name: Yer All Bleedin' Now
data.description: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing 424 over 9 seconds to enemies within 40 feet.

data.name: Bring It On
data.description: You strike out at all enemies 25 feet in front of you, inflicting 231 damage every second. The damage inflicted by this ability increases by 15% for every enemy that attacked you within the previous second, to a maximum of 60%.
